name: Does Not Compute (BishopBit)
description:
Does Not Compute has 3 levels of ascending difficulty and a limited time to complete them all. In each of them, you will need to drive our college teachers to their destinations in order to complete their routes. Keep in mind that cars from previously completed routes of the level will appear in your current one, try not to crash with your old self or your speed will be severely slowed down!

Our game also features a dynamic time of day and the possibility of rain. In addition, as a driver, you can use the radio to listen to different songs.

Misc.

Made with Unity.

Special thanks to ARSH Studios, Cartoon Lowpoly Small City Free Pack, Free Low Poly Desert Pack, Malong Brothers and Royalty Free Music from Bensound.
